name: Interactive Timeline
description: Generates an interactive timeline with customizable events, dates, and styling.
example_prompt: Create a timeline of major space missions in the 1960s

events.title: First Human in Space
events.description: Yuri Gagarin becomes the first human to journey into outer space.

events.title: First American in Space
events.description: Alan Shepard becomes the first American in space during the Freedom 7 mission.

events.title: First American to Orbit Earth
events.description: John Glenn orbits the Earth three times during the Friendship 7 mission.

events.title: Moon Landing
events.description: Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin become the first humans to set foot on the Moon.

fallback_html:
Interactive Timeline

Unable to generate a detailed timeline. Please try again with more specific events and dates.
